main event: Several groups of luminous, spherical or disc-shaped objects were observed over El Paso, Texas, on September 15, 1952.
interesting points: The objects were observed for approximately 30 minutes,The witnesses described the objects as erratic, with hovering and high-speed rotating flight,At least twelve individual lights were seen in a coordinated formation without sound.A group of illuminated objects was reported traveling very fast in a perfect echelon formation,The objects disappeared abruptly after passing overhead.
